tool.name: Get TCGA 450K data
tool.description: Download HM 450K data for a cancer type from TCGA
tool.help:
**What it does:**
get450K is a function to download latest version of HM450K DNA methylation for all samples of certain cancer types from TCGA website.Download all DNA methylation from HM450K level 3 data for the specified disease.
**Input:**
disease A character specifies the disease to download in TCGA such as BLCA,LUAD,LUSC,BRCA etc
**Output:**
DNA methylation data in the form of Rdata
